text:
- Singlife is more than
just an insurance firm.

(uplifting music begins)
It is a leading,
homegrown financial services company

providing trusted products
for people in Singapore
to achieve financial freedom

and gain control of
their financial wellbeing
at every stage of their life.
Formed in January, 2022,

through the merger of
Singlife and Aviva Singapore,

Singlife combined its
InsurTech capabilities

with Aviva Singapore's 40
years legacy of insurance,

investment solutions and
advisory capabilities.
Led by a digital-first culture,

Singlife has leveraged digitized
and intuitive solutions
that have enabled us to be agile

and nimble in responding to
customer needs efficiently,

and staying resilient
through the headwinds.
We have always prided ourselves

on being at the forefront
of tech innovation
in financial services.
However, we were met with new obstacles
as we came together as a merged entity

where we needed to unite
the company's data stored
in disparate environments.

Customer experience is at
the core of our business,

and we are committed to staying
on the pulse of their needs.
In order to meet the demand

for hyper-personalized
digital financial services,
we sought to do a seamless migration
of our business application to AWS Cloud.

Embracing digital technologies
as a business enabler,
the cloud allows us to deliver at speed,
scale, and precision,

and with simplicity, security,
and full transparency.
This allows us to deliver new features

and updates to customers
at a much greater speed.

At present, we are already
leveraging Amazon's SageMaker,
built to construct, train and deploy
machine learning models swiftly.
Being in the financial service industry,

consumer confidence is
of utmost importance.

We need a secure and
resilient infrastructure
supporting Singlife's operations.

With AWS' consistent
security patches and updates,
we are confident that our system

is well-protected against
malicious attacks,

ensuring that our customer
data remains in safe hands.

Ensuring customer confidence
and security means making sure
that we are here for the long term.
With Amazon's The Climate Pledge,

Singlife will be able to
ensure a sustainable business
through responsible investments,
innovative sustainable products,
and carbon-neutral operations.

Looking ahead, we want to
invest in our greatest asset,
our people.
In fact, we are currently working
with the AWS Professional Services team
to upskill or re-skill our staff
with training and development,
technical operations and management.
Ultimately, it is about developing a cloud
and digital-first mindset.
For Singlife, it always boils down
to how we can utilize technology
and service our customer better.

With AWS, I believe we
are in a good position

to do just that.
(uplifting music continues)
